text: Anti-Islam or anti-Muslim may refer to: *Criticism of Islam, criticism of the current or historical Islamic religion, its actions, teachings, omissions, structure, or nature *Islamophobia, the prejudice against, hatred, or bigotry towards the religion of Islam and Muslims *Persecution of Muslims, religious persecutions inflicted upon followers of the Islamic faith *War against Islam, a perceived campaign to harm, weaken or annihilate the societal system of Islam
title: Anti-Islam
